                                  # 1.4 jinja2 ä½¿ç”¨æ¡ˆä¾‹

                                  æ¯”å¦‚éœ€è¦å®ç°å¯¹è¢«æ§ç«¯ä¸»æœºå®‰è£…redisæœåŠ¡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„redisæœåŠ¡åªç›‘å¬æœ¬åœ°çš„127.0.0.1ç«¯å£ï¼Œæ¢å¥è¯è¯´ï¼Œå…¶ä»–ä¸»æœºæ˜¯ä¸å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®è¯¥redisæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•æ¥è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜å‘¢ï¼Ÿæ­¤æ—¶å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨jinja2çš„æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œåœ¨å…¶ä¸­å¼•ç”¨å˜é‡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨templateæ¨¡å—è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

                                  æœ¬æ¡ˆä¾‹ä½¿ç”¨äº†ï¼šjinja2æ¨¡æ¿ã€templatesæ¨¡å—ã€copyæ¨¡å—ã€yumæ¨¡å—ã€shellæ¨¡å—ã€serviceæ¨¡å—ã€varså®šä¹‰å˜é‡ã€registerå˜é‡æ³¨å†Œã€ignore_errorså¿½ç•¥é”™è¯¯ã€tagsæ ‡ç­¾ã€whenåˆ¤æ–­ã€notify å’Œ handlersé€šçŸ¥ä¸è§¦å‘ï¼ˆå¤„ç†ç¨‹åºï¼‰

                                  • 1ã€åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Redisé…ç½®æ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚ redis_conf.j2ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å…¶ä¸­ä¿®æ”¹Redisç»‘å®šåœ°å€ä»¥ä¾¦å¬æ‰€æœ‰IPåœ°å€ï¼š
                                  [root@localhost redis]# vim redis_conf.j2
bind ___JINJA20___ 127.0.0.1
port ___JINJA21___
protected-mode no
tcp-backlog 511
timeout 0
tcp-keepalive 300
daemonize yes
supervised no
pidfile /var/run/redis_6379.pid
loglevel notice

                                  åœ¨æ­¤ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨äº† bind {{ ansible_host }} 127.0.0.1 æ¥å‘Šè¯‰RedisæœåŠ¡åªæ¥å—æœ¬åœ°IPè¿æ¥ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨å˜é‡ redis_port æ¥æŒ‡å®šRedisç«¯å£ã€‚

                                  • 2ã€åœ¨Ansible Playbookä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨templateæ¨¡å—åŠ è½½è¯¥æ¨¡æ¿å¹¶æ¸²æŸ“å®ƒï¼Œç„¶åå°†æ¸²æŸ“åçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤åˆ¶åˆ°Redisé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹Playbookï¼š
                                  [root@localhost redis]# vim redis.yml
---
- name: éƒ¨ç½²RedisæœåŠ¡
  hosts: web
  remote_user: root
  gather_facts: no
  vars:
    redis_port: 6379  # æŒ‡å®šRedisç«¯å£

  tasks:
    - name: Upload yum repo
      copy: 
        src: /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo
        dest: /etc/yum.repos.d
        backup: no
      tags: 
       - upload_yum
       - upload_repo
       - redis_server

    - name: Upload epel repo
      copy:
        src: /etc/yum.repos.d/epel.repo
        dest: /etc/yum.repos.d/
        backup: no
      tags: 
       - upload_epel
       - upload_repo
       - redis_server

    - name: Check redis install
      shell: /usr/bin/rpm -q redis
      register: redis_msg
      ignore_errors: yes
      tags: 
       - check_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Install redis server
      yum: 
        name: redis
        state: present
      when: redis_msg.failed == true
      tags: 
       - install_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Upload redis.conf
      template:
        src: redis_conf.j2
        dest: /etc/redis.conf
      notify: Restart Redis
      tags: 
       - upload_redis.conf
       - redis_server

    - name: Start Redis server
      service:
        name: redis
        state: started
        enabled: yes
      tags: 
       - start_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Restart Redis server
      service:
        name: redis
        state: restarted
      tags:
       - restart_redis
        
    - name: Stop Redis Server
      service: 
        name: redis
        state: stopped
      tags: 
        - stop_redis
        - uninstall_redis

    - name: uninstall Redis Server
      yum: 
        name: redis
        state: absent
      tags: 
        - uninstall_redis

  handlers:
    - name: Restart Redis
      service:
        name: redis
        state: restarted

- name: install nginx
  yum: name=/tmp/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm state=latest
  
- name: conf

  tags: nginxconf
  notify: new conf to reload

- name: start service
  service: name=nginx state=started enabled=true
